docs.snippet: The candidacy of Donald Trump offers a unique opportunity the party would be foolish to miss....
docs.lead_paragraph: The candidacy of Donald Trump offers a unique opportunity the party would be foolish to miss.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by economist Robert H Frank underscores how Donald Trump's candidacy threatens down-ballot Republican congressional candidates, even in districts that have been gerrymandered by Republicans; observes that flipping many Republican-held districts will require spending in states that typical Democratic presidential campaigns would avoid; urges Hillary Clinton to explicitly make argument for flipping House control when coaxing Democratic donors, particularly in context of staunch Republican opposition to addressing climate change.

headline.main: Take Back the House, Democrats. Please.

docs.snippet: What do Hillary Clinton and Donald J. Trump need to focus on in the final eight weeks? Here’s some advice for both of them....
docs.lead_paragraph: What do Hillary Clinton and Donald J. Trump need to focus on in the final eight weeks? Here’s some advice for both of them.
docs.abstract: News Analysis; tasks both Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton must accomplish in final two months of presidential campaign, if either hopes to win White House, outlined.

docs.snippet: Former Canadian Prime Minister Brian Mulroney on Sunday criticized Donald Trump's potential plan to scrap the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) and said the U.S. presidential candidate will likely lose the Nov. 8 election....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Canadian Prime Minister Brian Mulroney on Sunday criticized Donald Trump's potential plan to scrap the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) and said the U.S. presidential candidate will likely lose the Nov. 8 election.

headline.main: Former Canadian PM Rebukes Trump on NAFTA, Predicts His Defeat
headline.print_headline: Former Canadian PM Rebukes Trump on NAFTA, Predicts His Defeat

docs.snippet: Democratic vice presidential candidate Tim Kaine on Sunday defended Hillary Clinton against criticism over her handling of classified information as secretary of state, saying she was unaware of the sensitivity of some information she exchanged ov...
docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic vice presidential candidate Tim Kaine on Sunday defended Hillary Clinton against criticism over her handling of classified information as secretary of state, saying she was unaware of the sensitivity of some information she exchanged over email because it had been "improperly labeled."

headline.main: Clinton's Classified Email Errors Due to 'Improper Labeling:' Kaine
headline.print_headline: Clinton's Classified Email Errors Due to 'Improper Labeling:' Kaine

docs.snippet: If Hillary Clinton carries Arizona in November, there's a good chance it won't be because Democrats on their own have flipped a reliable GOP state they hope to win consistently someday....
docs.lead_paragraph: If Hillary Clinton carries Arizona in November, there's a good chance it won't be because Democrats on their own have flipped a reliable GOP state they hope to win consistently someday.

headline.main: On Road to 270, Arizona Is Home to Best Chance for a Spoiler
headline.print_headline: On Road to 270, Arizona Is Home to Best Chance for a Spoiler

docs.snippet: Lawmakers return to Washington this week for an abbreviated election-season session in which they will likely do what they do best: the bare minimum....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lawmakers return to Washington this week for an abbreviated election-season session in which they will likely do what they do best: the bare minimum.

headline.main: Lawmakers Likely to Do What They Do Best: The Bare Minimum
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers Likely to Do What They Do Best: The Bare Minimum
